preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 17.4 g of barium carbonate (BaCO3) using a precision scale. 
 2. Weigh 15.3 g of copper(II) oxide (CuO). 
 3. Weigh 23.1 g of zinc oxide (ZnO). 
 4. Place all materials in a clean, dry ceramic or glass mixing container. 
 5. Use a mortar and pestle to thoroughly mix the powders until a uniform color and texture is achieved, approximately 10-15 minutes.
